subject: RE: [junit] Testing XML and XSLT
msgSnippet: That s interesting, at first glance (from the code snippets people posted) it seemed as if it was just comparing files. I ll have to check it out. Thanks ...
messageBody:
That's interesting, at first glance (from the code snippets people posted)
it seemed as if it was just comparing files.

I'll have to check it out.

Thanks

From: Vladimir R. Bossicard [mailto:vladimir@...]

Subject: Re: [junit] Testing XML and XSLT


> We have a different implementation for this,
>
> We built a class that compares two DOM objects after being cleaned by
> nekohtml.

Ok I repeat myself one more time: the sandbox module has a DOMAssert
class. You'll have to do a cvs checkout first.

-Vladimir
